response.overview: When a quiet man picks up a hitchhiker on a remote Swiss road, an unexpected journey begins. What starts as a simple ride turns into a chaotic, multilingual road trip full of missed signals, unlikely connections, and one womanâ€™s desperate attempt to catch a train.  GARE nid WYT is a humorous tale about communication beyond words, and the strange, serendipitous ways Swiss people (Note: Switzerland has 4 national languages) live with each other.
response.title: GARE nid WYT
